description:
Rules are simple: 
If you observe an anomaly, something out-of-place or something not-seen-before, run back to where you started. 
Otherwise, keep running. 
When you reach Exit 11, youâ€™ll manage to escape from this nightmare.
name: Exit Slum 11
intro: Exit Slum 11 is an anomaly observation running simulator with an eerie atmosphere.
